classification.description: This compound belongs to the class of organic compounds known as dibenzocycloheptenes. These are compounds containing a dibenzocycloheptene moiety, which consists of two benzene rings connected by a cycloheptene ring.

drug-interaction.name: Benzylpenicilloyl polylysine
drug-interaction.description: Deptropine may decrease effectiveness of Benzylpenicilloyl polylysine as a diagnostic agent.

drug-interaction.name: Betahistine
drug-interaction.description: The therapeutic efficacy of Betahistine can be decreased when used in combination with Deptropine.

drug-interaction.name: Hyaluronidase (ovine)
drug-interaction.description: The therapeutic efficacy of Hyaluronidase (ovine) can be decreased when used in combination with Deptropine.

drug-interaction.name: Amphetamine
drug-interaction.description: Amphetamine may decrease the sedative and stimulatory activities of Deptropine.
